attributes.action: Help create a volunteer section in emergency services.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Recent flooding has stretched our emergency services to breaking point.
Create a trained civilian section that can be called upon to assist the services in times like the recent flooding.
The police have "specials", so why shouldnt the fire/ambulance services have something?
This would mean the highly trained fire crews could deal with fires/RTC's and leave things like pumping flood water to trained civilian crews.
